name: Connect Shape
description:
LostRelicGames Game jam about connection

Click the points on the grid to create an outline that matches the shown shape in size to earn points

There is 3.5 seconds to create each shape or you lose

There is a bug where 2 shapes appear. If that happens then create the shape of the newer shape that appeared. Game is broken

How to play:

  • Right click a point to make it a starting point
  • Left click the same point
  • Then left click another point to make a connection
  • Left clicking starting point again will finish the connection

Example:

The blue square is a 3x3. Therefore connect a 3x3 on the grid to get point.

Made with Godot
